metadata.title: RHSA-2024:8874: haproxy security update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The haproxy packages provide a reliable, high-performance network load balancer for TCP and HTTP-based applications.

Security Fix(es):

* haproxy: untrimmed URI fragments may lead to exposure of confidential data on static servers (CVE-2023-45539)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: haproxy: untrimmed URI fragments may lead to exposure of confidential data on static servers

platform: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.6 Advanced Mission Critical Update Support

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8 is installed
haproxy is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
